search.query: `cs_crowdstrike_eventstream` | rename "event.ComputerName" as ComputerName | dedup ComputerName | table ComputerName

html.p: Data Collection: Use CrowdStrike Event Stream Add-on for collecting CrowdStrike data.

search.query: `cs_crowdstrike_eventstream` | head 1 | stats count | eval data=if(count>0, "Data Present", "Data Not Present"), label="`cs_crowdstrike_eventstream`" | table label, data

`cs_crowdstrike_eventstream` "metadata.eventType"=DetectionSummaryEvent action="allowed" $tkn_host$ | table event.ComputerName, event.LocalIP, event.UserName, event.DetectDescription, event.DetectName, event.CommandLine, event.MD5String, event.SHA256String, event.ProcessId, event.PatternDispositionDescription, event.ParentCommandLine, event.Objective, event.DetectId, event.FalconHostLink, event.SeverityName, event.Tactic, event.Technique, event.ProcessStartTime, event.ProcessEndTime | rename event.* as * | eval ProcessStartTime=strftime(ProcessStartTime, "%F %T"), ProcessEndTime=strftime(ProcessEndTime, "%F %T") | `cs_crowdstrike_malware_detected_report_filter`

`cs_crowdstrike_eventstream` "metadata.eventType"=DetectionSummaryEvent action="blocked" $tkn_host$ | table event.ComputerName, event.LocalIP, event.UserName, event.DetectDescription, event.DetectName, event.CommandLine, event.MD5String, event.SHA256String, event.ProcessId, event.PatternDispositionDescription, event.ParentCommandLine, event.Objective, event.DetectId, event.FalconHostLink, event.SeverityName, event.Tactic, event.Technique, event.ProcessStartTime, event.ProcessEndTime | rename event.* as * | eval ProcessStartTime=strftime(ProcessStartTime, "%F %T"), ProcessEndTime=strftime(ProcessEndTime, "%F %T") | `cs_crowdstrike_malware_prevented_filter`
